name: crazy maze - Level-3-x ~疯狂迷宫 ~ 狂った迷路 ~ Laberinto loco ~ Labyrinthe fou ~ Verrücktes Labyrinth
detailed_description:
This game is a maze game for smart people. There are many different roads and moving doors in the maze. There are 12 maps in the game. Each level has been carefully designed. The more difficult the level is, the bigger the maze map is. In the beautiful 3D world, take you into the maze and feel the wonderful maze journey
We have prepared labyrinths for you in four environments, each with three maps.
Environment 1: Daytime (a total of 3 maps in this environment)
Environment 2: Evening (a total of 3 maps in this environment)
Environment 3: Night (a total of 3 maps in this environment) (get this DLC)
Environment 4: Mist (a total of 3 maps in this environment)

among them
The first map of each environment is a simple map that allows players to adapt to the new environment.
The second map of each environment, with moving doors, is more difficult than the first one
On the third map of each environment, the map becomes huge and the challenge is more difficult

Environment 1-4, the map will be bigger and bigger, more and more difficult

More environment is not yet to be continued....

short_description: Have you challenged the real maze? Welcome to the 3D maze game, take you into a huge maze world to find a way out, we have carefully designed 12 labyrinths, one is bigger than one, one is harder than one!

  • OS: windows7,windowsXP,windows8,windows10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
